subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Gay returned his medal last year after accepting a one-year doping suspension, but the status of the United States’ second-place finish in the London Games had been in limbo.
snippet: Gay returned his medal last year after accepting a one-year doping suspension, but the status of the United States’ second-place finish in the London Games had been in limbo.
